text: læa phraxngkh nan khux phu thi thrng hı nalng ma cak fak fa læw thrng hı xxk ma dwy na nan sung phanthu phuch khxng thuk sing læa rea di hı xxk cak phanthu phuch nan sung sing thi mi si kheiyw cak sing thi mi si kheiyw nan rea di hı xxk ma sung meld thi sxn taw kan xyu læa cak tn xin th phala mnan can khxng man pen thlay ta læa thrng hı xxk ma dwy na nan xik sung swn xngun læa say tun læa thabthim doy mi sphaph khlay kan læa mi khlay kan “phwk cea cng mxng du phl khxng man” “meux man reim xxk phl læa meux man kæ suk thæcring nı sing hela nan nænxn mi sayyan makmay sahrab hmu chn phu sraththa”
